module.title: Resource: Users & Roles
module.description:
Support for users and groups stored in database.
Version <0.2.6: Please run Model_User::migrate after module update and make a new database dump!
module.log: Changed ACL right key for controllers.
Add account ID for OAuth registration.
Improve password handling with own model and logic.
Change default values of user indices.
Soften index type of account ID from unique to index.
Set status constants and default status in model.
Support user tokens backed by user passwords.
module.author: Christian Würker

config.name: status.register
config.title: user status to be set on register, set to 1 for 'auto active'

config.name: name.preg
config.title: regular expression to match with username

config.name: email.mandatory
config.title: user needs a mail address on register and change

module.sql: ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` ADD `accountId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL AFTER `userId`, ADD UNIQUE (`accountId`) ;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` ADD `country` CHAR(2) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL AFTER `surname`; ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` ADD INDEX(`country`);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `<%?prefix%>user_passwords` ( `userPasswordId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `algo` varchar(30) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `salt` varchar(32) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL, `hash` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `failsLast` tinyint(1) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `failsTotal` smallint(6) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `createdAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned NOT NULL, `failedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `usedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', `revokedAt` decimal(12,0) unsigned DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`userPasswordId`), KEY `userId` (`userId`), KEY `status` (`status`), KEY `algo` (`algo`), KEY `hash` (`hash`), KEY `failsLast` (`failsLast`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COLLATE=utf8_unicode_ci;

ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` CHANGE `accountId` `accountId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0', CHANGE `roleId` `roleId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NOT NULL, CHANGE `companyId` `companyId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0', CHANGE `roomId` `roomId` INT(11) UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` DROP INDEX `accountId`, ADD INDEX `accountId` (`accountId`) USING BTREE;
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>users` CHANGE `status` `status` TINYINT(1) NULL DEFAULT '0';
ALTER TABLE `<%?prefix%>user_tokens` ADD `scope` VARCHAR(127) NULL DEFAULT '' AFTER `status`, ADD INDEX (`scope`);
